trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Loveland
There were no other sightings in Loveland on or around January 6th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWitnessed strange craft traveling North by north west in a semi linear path(changing its elevation, up then down,in a seemingly unnatural way) maintaining a medium speed rate. no lights or any markings indicating its terrestrial origins. its shape was at times a cigar and at moments a saucer shape. it looked smooth and either silver or white. moments after, a black, military style helicopter was seen going in the same direction as the unidentified craft, being around a half mile out.
